intents.tag: (0) How are you doing today?
repsonses: (0) How are you doing today?

intents.tag: (1) Do you know where you are?
patterns: Oh, hello there. I'm doing alright, thank you for asking.
Oh, hello! I'm doing well, thank you for asking.
I don't know...I just feel confused.
repsonses: (1) Do you know where you are?

intents.tag: (2) Do you know what year it is?
patterns: Oh, I see. Yes, I am here in the hospital.
Ah, I see. Thank you for letting me know.
repsonses: (2) Do you know what year it is?

intents.tag: (3) Do you know what season it is?
patterns: Oh my, time certainly flies doesn't it?
Oh, wow. I had no idea it's already that far into the future.
repsonses: (3) Do you know what season it is?

intents.tag: (4) Do you remember the time when <insert pleasant memory cue>?
patterns: Ah, yes. Winter it is.
Oh, of course. Leaves must be falling everywhere.
Three. Why do you ask?
repsonses: (4) Do you remember the time when <insert pleasant memory cue>?

intents.tag: (5) How many children do you have?
patterns: I have children? Hmm, I can't seem to remember how many or their names.
Oh, I have three beautiful children. Such kind and loving souls, all of them.
I have three kids. Two girls and a boy. They used to visit me here but I haven't seen them in a while.
repsonses: (5) How many children do you have?

intents.tag: (6) Do you have a spouse? What is their name?
repsonses: (6) Do you have a spouse? What is their name?

intents.tag: (7) Where do you live?
repsonses: (7) Where do you live?

intents.tag: (8) What are your hobbies?
repsonses: (8) What are your hobbies?

intents.tag: (9) Are you feeling scared? Afraid? Tell me more about how you are feeling.
patterns: I'm not sure, dear. Do you know?
repsonses: (9) Are you feeling scared? Afraid? Tell me more about how you are feeling.

intents.tag: (10) Do you like to read?
repsonses: (10) Do you like to read?

intents.tag: (11) Today is <insert date>
repsonses: (11) Today is <insert date>

intents.tag: (12) It is the year <insert year>
patterns: Hmm, I'm not quite sure. Can you tell me?
Hmm, I'm not sure. What year is it?
repsonses: (12) It is the year <insert year>

intents.tag: (13) It is <season> now
patterns: Let's see…I do believe it's winter?
It's hard to keep track sometimes. Is it fall already?
repsonses: (13) It is <season> now

intents.tag: (14) You are in <insert name of hospital>
patterns: I do believe I am in the hospital.
No, I'm not exactly sure. Can you tell me where we are?
I think I'm at home. But it doesn't look like my home.
repsonses: (14) You are in <insert name of hospital>

intents.tag: (15) You are in the hospital because you are sick.
patterns: Why am I here?
repsonses: (15) You are in the hospital because you are sick.

intents.tag: (16) You must be feeling very scared right now.
patterns: Honestly, I do feel a bit scared sometimes. It's hard not being able to remember things like I used to.
repsonses: (16) You must be feeling very scared right now.

intents.tag: (17) Tell me about your friends in school.
repsonses: (17) Tell me about your friends in school.

intents.tag: (18) Tell me about your children.
patterns: Oh, I remember when I went on a road trip with my family to the beach. It was such a lovely time.
Yes, I remember when we used to have picnics in the park all the time. It was so much fun.
Wait, who are you?
repsonses: (18) Tell me about your children.

intents.tag: (19) Okay.
patterns: Yes, it's a bit overwhelming at times.
I have three children, two daughters and a son.
Vacation? Where did we go?
repsonses: (19) Okay.

intents.tag: (20) Mhhm
patterns: Oh. Am I going to be okay?
repsonses: (20) Mhhm
